Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: iclarkec
Reviews.Content: Good features for the price. Works well and would suit someone who is not looking for too much in a phone. Take time go through setting up apps etc. since there is no manual available.

Reviews.Title: NOT BAD AT ALL!
Reviews.Author: Sergio A. Silva
Reviews.Content: This is actually a great cell phone. Just don't expect the same features of a Samsung Galaxy or an iPhone, when you are paying only $ 49 for it. It is a little slower than those other phones, because of the small RAM memory, but overall it is a very nice phone. It works well outside the States, in central and south America.

Reviews.Title: i liked
Reviews.Author: lanni
Reviews.Content: is a good cell phone if compare price, i don't like the camera  but is a good cheap cell phone.

Reviews.Content: just like the other one, delivery was prompt. it is worth buying, had all prescribed components, attractive and user friendly. I would suggest that you provide protective cover.

Reviews.Content: it hangs up a lot  and its slow and it does not tell you how to get the back off and clears all the numbers you put in

Reviews.Title: mine wont work
Reviews.Author: Nicolas Shelley
Reviews.Content: the phone has very little memory and is not very good of a phone for somebody who uses more than 10 apps. I will be returning mine and getting a phone with more memory, but otherwise the user interface was good and the camera was good but its just not the right phone for me

Reviews.Content: very good phone. buy it for my dad. and liked. is easy to use and adapts to what the nesecita. Good for the value and works very well.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: IT-SolutionsNYC
Reviews.Content: For the price these are great phones, I gave it to my 10 years old son and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone, unusable.
Reviews.Author: wr
Reviews.Content: For me is another bad purchase from amazon on only few days. This phone is unable to read the contacts from the sim card. Even the new contacts that I added to the phone I'm not able to find. So this phone is useless as phone. I will check with my children if it worth something as a toy. The phone also disconnect from the wireless often and don't have a GPS that use GPS satellites.

Reviews.Title: focus
Reviews.Author: oliver mitchell
Reviews.Content: Camera not good. The focus was poor overall it a kid phone .the price should be for 20 ......they need to ..

Reviews.Title: Regular team
Reviews.Author: rossy
Reviews.Content: I like a basic computer and enjoyable qualities only thing is that it has little internal memory and fewer permissions

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Anderson
Reviews.Content: It's a $50 dollar phone. It freezes, it crashes, it has a miserable ~210MB of usable RAM, and 160MB of storage space. It drops calls if you so much as look at it funny, and lags like you wouldn't believe if you try to do anything more strenuous than type a text message.But the sound quality isn't terrible, so you can make phone calls, you can go on the internet (provided you have a wifi connection, as this phone doesn't do 3g and will be painfully slow if you try to use your service provider's data connection), you can check Google Maps, you can send emails (just don't have high hopes on them leaving your outbox very quickly), and you can send text messages.If you have more than $50 to spend on a phone, do so, because this phone isn't so great. However, if your budget is too tight for anything else and you really need a smartphone, you could do worse than this one.

Reviews.Title: slow to booth, terrible camera and no memory
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I'm giving it 2stars because the frame looks ok, but my title said it all. If you ask me, don't  buy!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Carlos Alizo
Reviews.Content: This is very good productit works very well until nowGood performance and friendly operating systemPrice is goodI recommend it

Reviews.Title: it's a good phone
Reviews.Author: Subir Saha
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our parents and they liked it a lot. It was in our budget too.I would recommend this phone to everyone.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Omobola Majekodunmi
Reviews.Content: It is lovely I really like it.am enjoying it right now.thank you for being there and not disappointing me.thank you

Reviews.Title: good.
Reviews.Author: gûolinliwei1234
Reviews.Content: The mailing speed quickly, good reputation guarantee. Thank you for your honest cooperation. Hope to cooperate happily in the future.

Reviews.Title: Very decent phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Neal
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty decent phone for the price.  I purchased it to use in foreign countries with local SIMs.  I don't like to carry an expensive phone around with me while in certain areas.The phone is functional as advertised.  Smart phone functions, etc.  It is pretty easy to use and navigate.  You need to add and SD card if you want to take pics or use music and the sound quality (mic and speaker) isn't great, but what do you expect for an inexpensive phone.  Overall I am happy with the phone based on what my expectations and uses are.

Reviews.Title: Save your money!
Reviews.Author: Bob H.
Reviews.Content: Save your money! I have owned other BLU phones (Life Play) and needed a cheap phone in a pinch. Well, this one was definitely cheap. I read reviews and wasn't expecting anything too spectacular - and I didn't get it.With the preloaded apps and OS, there is only 43MB of phone storage available.The phone, which is the main function I bought this for, is atrocious. If you can actually understand the voice on the line, it sounds as though its in a tin can. The sound quality through the phone is so bad, I can barely carry on a conversation.I should have just threw $50 out the window. Avoid this phone.

Unlocked Dual SIM 3.5-Inch High Resolution HVGA Display, 1 GHz Processor
GSM-GPRS-EDGE 2G 850/900/1800/2100
2MP Camera, Android 2.3 Gingerbread, 512MB ROM-256MB RAM
3.5mm Audio Jack, FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Dash JR D140 Unlocked Dual Sim Phone (Silver)
